        this.scripts = [];

class Script {
    constructor(_redisClient) {
        this._redisClient = _redisClient;
        this.args = [];
        this.keys = [];
    }
    setArgs(...args) {
        this.args = args;
    }
    setKeys(...keys) {
        this.keys = keys;
    }
    fromFile(fileName) {
        this.loadBuffer(fileName);
        return this;
    }
    fromScript(script) {
        this.loadBuffer(script);
        return this;
    }
    loadBuffer(name) {

            .then((sha) => {

            return this;
